name: Robert
placeOfBirth: North Julie, British Indian Ocean Territory (Chagos Archipelago)
description: Robert is a hazel-eyed llama with blonde hair, standing 192 cm tall. Originally from North Julie, British Indian Ocean Territory (Chagos Archipelago), Robert enjoys cooking, wood carving, knitting. Known for their playful and mischievous personality, Robert is a beloved member of the llama community.
